description.text: At 8th level, the agitator can lift an enthralled crowd's emotions and turn them toward a common purpose. As a standard action after she has used her enthralling agitation-- but before the enthrall effect wears off--she can target the affected creatures with a plausible suggestion (DC = 10 + 1/2 her rogue level + her Charisma modifier). that has a duration of up to 1 day.
